segments.text: Steven , we are preparing a martial arts show for the New Year's party . Would you like to join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to ! But I have never learned martial arts , and there is only a month left before the New Year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's OK . A month is enough for you to learn the basic movements . It would be great to have you with us on the show .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds great ! Shall I learn the actions that Jet Li did in the movies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . You know , there are many schools and styles of kung fu . What we will perform is a set of Chinese shadow boxing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whatever ! I'm glad to learn something of Chinese kung fu . Thanks for asking me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for joining us ! Now let's see some pictures and know more about kung fu .
segments.speaker: S1
